targets.rawSql:
SELECT tdb_publisher, SUM (AUsize) AS AU_size from (SELECT au_current.name, tdb_publisher, MAX(content_size) as AUsize
FROM plnmonitor.au_current INNER JOIN plnmonitor.lockss_box_info on lockss_box_info.box=au_current.box
WHERE lockss_box_info.name = 'LOCKSS_BOX_NAME' GROUP BY au_current.name, tdb_publisher) AS TDB GROUP BY tdb_publisher

SELECT
  name, active_aus
FROM plnmonitor.lockss_box_data_current INNER JOIN plnmonitor.lockss_box_info on lockss_box_info.box=lockss_box_data_current.box where name='LOCKSS_BOX_NAME'

SELECT
  MAX(last_completed_poll)
  
FROM plnmonitor.au_current
INNER JOIN plnmonitor.lockss_box_info on lockss_box_info.box=au_current.box

SELECT
  MAX(last_completed_crawl)
  
FROM plnmonitor.au_current
INNER JOIN plnmonitor.lockss_box_info on lockss_box_info.box=au_current.box

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(updated_at,$__interval),
  min(free) AS "free"
FROM plnmonitor.lockss_box_data_version
INNER JOIN plnmonitor.lockss_box_info on lockss_box_data_version.box = lockss_box_info.box
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(updated_at) AND
  lockss_box_info.name = 'LOCKSS_BOX_NAME'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  lockss_box_info.name AS shortname,
  latitude,
  longitude,
  lockss_box_data_current.active_aus
FROM plnmonitor.lockss_box_info
INNER JOIN plnmonitor.lockss_box_data_current ON lockss_box_info.box=lockss_box_data_current.box
WHERE name='LOCKSS_BOX_NAME'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(updated_at,$__interval),
  min (extract(epoch from updated_at)*1000 - last_completed_poll) AS "last completed poll avg"
FROM plnmonitor.au_version
INNER JOIN plnmonitor.lockss_box_info on lockss_box_info.box = au_version.box
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(updated_at) and lockss_box_info.name = 'LOCKSS_BOX_NAME'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Maximum time since last completed poll

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(updated_at,$__interval),
  min (extract(epoch from updated_at)*1000 - last_completed_crawl) AS "last completed crawl avg"
FROM plnmonitor.au_version
INNER JOIN plnmonitor.lockss_box_info on lockss_box_info.box = au_version.box
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(updated_at) and lockss_box_info.name = 'LOCKSS_BOX_NAME'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Maximum time since last completed crawl

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(updated_at,$__interval),
  max(size)  AS "box size",
  max(used)  AS "box used space"
FROM plnmonitor.lockss_box_data_version
INNER JOIN plnmonitor.lockss_box_info on lockss_box_info.box = lockss_box_data_version.box
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(updated_at) and lockss_box_info.name = 'LOCKSS_BOX_NAME'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(updated_at,$__interval),
  max(free)  AS "box free space"
FROM plnmonitor.lockss_box_data_version
INNER JOIN plnmonitor.lockss_box_info on lockss_box_info.box = lockss_box_data_version.box
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(updated_at) and lockss_box_info.name = 'LOCKSS_BOX_NAME'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(updated_at,$__interval),
  max(active_aus)  AS "active AUs"
FROM plnmonitor.lockss_box_data_version
INNER JOIN plnmonitor.lockss_box_info on lockss_box_info.box = lockss_box_data_version.box
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(updated_at) and lockss_box_info.name = 'LOCKSS_BOX_NAME'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(updated_at,$__interval),
  max(orphaned_aus)  AS "orphaned AUs"
FROM plnmonitor.lockss_box_data_version
INNER JOIN plnmonitor.lockss_box_info on lockss_box_info.box = lockss_box_data_version.box
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(updated_at) and lockss_box_info.name = 'LOCKSS_BOX_NAME'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(updated_at,$__interval),
  max(deleted_aus)  AS "deleted AUs"
FROM plnmonitor.lockss_box_data_version
INNER JOIN plnmonitor.lockss_box_info on lockss_box_info.box = lockss_box_data_version.box
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(updated_at) and lockss_box_info.name = 'LOCKSS_BOX_NAME'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  lockss_box_info.name as "LOCKSS box name",
  (lockss_box.ipaddress) as "IP address",
  (lockss_box_info.country) as "Country",
  (SPLIT_PART((SUBSTRING(lockss_box.daemon_full_version::text FROM 35 for 7)), ',', 1)) as "Daemon version",
  (lockss_box_data_current.active_aus) as "Active AUs",
  (created_at) as "Active since",
  (SPLIT_PART(SPLIT_PART(lockss_box.platform::text,'=',2), ',', 1)) as "Platform",
  (SPLIT_PART(SPLIT_PART(lockss_box.java_version::text,'=',2), ',', 1)) as "Java version"
FROM plnmonitor.lockss_box_info INNER JOIN plnmonitor.lockss_box_data_current on lockss_box_info.box=lockss_box_data_current.box
INNER JOIN plnmonitor.lockss_box on lockss_box.id = lockss_box_info.box
WHERE name='LOCKSS_BOX_NAME'

SELECT
  institution.shortname as "Location",
  lockss_box_info.box,
  lockss_box_info.name,
  lockss_box_info.organizational_manager,
  lockss_box_info.technical_manager,
  CONCAT(person.first_name, ' ', person.name) as "Name",
  person.email_address as "Email",
  lockss_box_info.username,
  lockss_box_info.country,
  lockss_box_info.institution


FROM plnmonitor.lockss_box_info
INNER JOIN plnmonitor.person ON technical_manager=person.id or organizational_manager=person.id
INNER JOIN plnmonitor.institution ON lockss_box_info.institution=institution.id
WHERE lockss_box_info.name = 'LOCKSS_BOX_NAME'

SELECT
  au_current.name AS AU_name,
  MAX(content_size) AS size,
  MIN(creation_time) AS ingested_by_network_on,
  MAX(recent_poll_agreement) AS recent_poll_agreement,
  MAX(disk_usage) AS Disk_usage,
  MIN(last_crawl) AS Last_crawl,
  min(last_poll_result) AS last_poll_result,
  MAX(last_completed_poll) AS Last_completed_poll,
  MAX(plugin_name) AS plugin_name,
  MAX(au_lockss_id) AS au_lockss_id
FROM plnmonitor.au_current
INNER JOIN plnmonitor.lockss_box_info on lockss_box_info.box=au_current.box
WHERE lockss_box_info.name = 'LOCKSS_BOX_NAME'
GROUP BY au_current.name
ORDER BY au_current.name

panels.title: Archival Units Details for LOCKSS box LOCKSS_BOX_NAME

matcher.options: last participation in a poll from peer
last time peer was invited in poll

targets.rawSql: select lockss_box_info.name as "Box name", lockss_box.ipaddress as "Box IP address", peer_lockss_id as "Peer IP address", polls_rejected * 1.0 / (NULLIF(invitation_count,0) * 1.0) as "polls rejection ratio", last_message as "last message received from peer", invitation_count as "#invitations sent to peer", message_count as "#messages from plnmonitor.peer",  polls_called as "#polls called by peer", polls_rejected as "#polls rejected by peer",  last_vote as "last time peer voted", last_poll as "last participation in a poll from peer", last_invitation as "last time peer was invited in poll", votes_cast as "#votes casted by peer"  from plnmonitor.peer INNER JOIN plnmonitor.lockss_box on lockss_box.id = peer.box INNER JOIN plnmonitor.lockss_box_info on lockss_box_info.box = peer.box where REGEXP_REPLACE(peer_lockss_id, '(TCP:\[|]:9\d+)', '', 'g')  in (select ipaddress from plnmonitor.lockss_box ) AND lockss_box_info.name ='LOCKSS_BOX_NAME' order by peer.box;

names: last participation in a poll from peer
last time peer was invited in poll
